---
Help: Multi Form Example with Proxy
Test
---
!define TEST_SYSTEM {slim}
!define slim.port {0}
!define slim.host {127.0.0.1}
!define COMMAND_PATTERN {..\Example\SlimProxy\_SlimProxy.BuildAndRun.bat}

!3 Start 3 instances of MultiFormExample on different ports

| script | slim proxy |
| start process | cmd.exe | /c ..\Example\MultiFormExample\_MultiFormExample.BuildAndRun.bat 8090 |
| start process | cmd.exe | /c ..\Example\MultiFormExample\_MultiFormExample.BuildAndRun.bat 8091 |
| start process | cmd.exe | /c ..\Example\MultiFormExample\_MultiFormExample.BuildAndRun.bat 8092 |

!3 Connect Proxy to targets

| script | slim proxy |
| connect to target | Target1 | localhost | 8090 |
| connect to target | Target2 | localhost | 8091 |
| connect to target | Target3 | localhost | 8092 |

!3 Switch to Target 1 and add Alice (ID 1)

| script | slim proxy |
| switch to target | Target1 |

| add entry |
| name | entry date | add? | id? | working years for company? |
| Alice | 1990-01-01 | true | $AliceId= | >35 |

!3 Switch to Target 2 and add Bob (ID 1) and Bob2 (ID 2)

| script | slim proxy |
| switch to target | Target2 |

| add entry |
| name | entry date | add? | id? | working years for company? |
| Bob | 2016-09-21 | true | $BobId= | >8 |
| Bob2 | 2018-01-01 | true | $Bob2Id= | >5 |

!3 Verify separation

!4 On Target 1: ID 1 is Alice, ID 2 is unknown

| script | slim proxy |
| switch to target | Target1 |

| select entry |
| sel id | cur name? |
| $AliceId | Alice |
| $Bob2Id | |

!4 On Target 2: ID 1 is Bob, ID 2 is Bob2

| script | slim proxy |
| switch to target | Target2 |

| select entry |
| sel id | cur name? |
| $BobId | Bob |
| $Bob2Id | Bob2 |

!3 Cleanup (Disconnect)

| script | slim proxy |
| disconnect |
